amendment.description: To promote international cooperation on missile defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3322 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3322 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S6693-6695, S6705; text: CR S6693-6694) To promote international cooperation on missile defense.
